events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car. My vehicle sustained heavy rear-end damage.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under the Auto Accident cluster due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to help guide you through the claim process and communications.
We have acknowledged your auto accident claim and will begin processing all related documentation and investigations.
Please submit your police report, photos of the damage to your vehicle, and any repair estimates for our review.
All requested documents, including photos and the police report, have been submitted successfully for further investigation.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has officially commenced with a focus on fault and liability.
The investigation has concluded, confirming the other party's fault in the rear-end collision incident involving your vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and repair estimates reviewed by our claims department.
Customer expressed concerns about the proposed settlement amount, stating it is insufficient to cover all repair costs.
Due to customer concerns over the settlement, the claim has been escalated to a senior claims adjuster for review.
After review, the claim has been approved with an updated settlement amount more aligned with repair costs.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to your bank account to cover repairs.
The claim has been officially closed following payment and confirmation that repair work has commenced.
